Package Service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
Service.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
The UserService class provides methods to handle user-related functionalities.
Author:
Zoe Zhou

  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      public UserService()
      Constructs a new UserService object and initializes UserDao instance.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public int addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object representing the user to be added.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected in the database after the insertion operation.

    • getUserByNameAndPassword

      public User getUserByNameAndPassword(String name, String password)
      Retrieves a user from the database by name and password.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      The User object representing the retrieved user, or null if not found.

    • updateLastTime

      public void updateLastTime(int uid)
      Updates the last login time of a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      uid - The ID of the user whose last login time needs to be updated.
